title: haiexplorer: Interactive HAI Burden Explorer
text: haiexplorer provides Germany PPS 2011 HAI burden dataset Shiny app explore DALYs = YLL + YLD, cases deaths across HAP, UTI, BSI, SSI CDI. Launch app: haiexplorer::launch_app() Dataset: hai_germany_2011 (95% intervals YLL/YLD breakdown) Article: Getting started (see Articles tab)

title: haiexplorer: Interactive HAI Burden Explorer
text: interactive metric switch + YLL/YLD stacking helps users see whether burden driven mortality (YLL) morbidity (YLD). Top-N type filters guide clear conclusion.

title: HAI burden (Germany, PPS 2011) with uncertainty and YLL/YLD — hai_germany_2011
text: tibble 6 rows 16 variables: type HAI type "". cases, deaths, dalys, yll, yld Point estimates (integers). cases_lo, cases_hi 95\ deaths_lo, deaths_hi95\ dalys_lo, dalys_hi95\ yll_lo, yll_hi95\ yld_lo, yld_hi95\Zacher et al. (2019), Euro Surveill 24(46):1900135.hai_germany_2011Point estimates 95% uncertainty intervals annual cases, attributable deaths, total dalys, DALY components yll (years life lost) yld (years lived disability) five healthcare-associated infections (HAP, UTI, BSI, SSI, CDI), plus total row "".attribute dalys_per_100k_total gives total DALYs per 100,000 population (Germany total: 308.2).datasets

title: haiexplorer: Interactive HAI Burden Explorer — haiexplorer-package
text: Data tools explore healthcare-associated infections (HAIs) using cases, deaths DALYs. Includes Shiny app interactively explore dataset.
